message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.SI

This paper focuses on automated hate speech detection, which is a common topic in the natural language processing (NLP) field. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel method using a Conditional Variational Autoencoder (CVAE) as a discriminative model, which falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with hate speech, which is a sensitive topic related to cybersecurity (cs.CR) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
